messages.message:
I'm still running into something similar when trying to run the validations. Is there another token that we should use for api-server? I've already been using the instabase-dev power user creds for api-server and they have been rotated

```level=ERROR time=2024-08-28 15:45:26,490 msg="Uncaught exception in webserver while handling request: Error=An error occurred (AccessDeniedException) when calling the Invoke operation: User: arn:aws:iam::083423824311:user/S3DogfoodUser is not authorized to perform: lambda:InvokeFunction on resource: arn:aws:lambda:us-west-1:083423824311:function:-default-udf:$LATEST because no identity-based policy allows the lambda:InvokeFunction action.
